body_html: nD convolutions can be realized by summing a sequence of (n-1)D convolutions. See here for an implementation of a 4D convolution layer using TensorFlow's conv3d layer. Details can be found in the docstring.
body_text: nD convolutions can be realized by summing a sequence of (n-1)D convolutions. See here for an implementation of a 4D convolution layer using TensorFlow's conv3d layer. Details can be found in the docstring.
body: nD convolutions can be realized by summing a sequence of (n-1)D convolutions. See [here](https://github.com/funkey/conv4d) for an implementation of a 4D convolution layer using TensorFlow's `conv3d` layer. Details can be found in the [docstring](https://github.com/funkey/conv4d/blob/master/conv4d.py#L27).
